mentionReplies: I heard you were talking shit about me. I'll fuck you up.
I am a cyber nigga, I browse the dark web.
descriptions: Returns a random number between 0 and the number given. If a second number is given, rolls the dice that many times(max 20). Usage: `!dice <number> <rolls>`
Tells you if a minecraft server is online. Usage: `!status <server address>`
Prints a list of commands. Usage: `!commands`
Prints the status of my minecraft server. Usage `!server` or `!server help`
Picks one of a list of strings. Usage: `!choose <option1> <option2> <option3>...`
